Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 103rd/Wood
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Vincennes, 107th, Western and 103rd due to street blockage near 103rd/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Vincennes, 107th, Western and 103rd due to street blockage near 103rd/Wood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
